This application convert [Zoom's chat file](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115004792763-Saving-in-meeting-chat) from `.txt` to `.xlsx`, for easy data manipulation and analysis.

**Source code** is available in [Github](https://github.com/Lightbridge-KS/ZoomInterface)
